name: oDOP
description: oDOP is a stable coin based on Dominican Peso, the official currency of Dominican Republic. The oDOP cryptocurrency works with a single entity OuroSRL which is the sole minter of the oDOP token. Traders that mint/redeem oDOP are subject to KYC/AML checks and only after having passing those then they can purchase or redeem the oDOP token. Sales of oDOP for fiat currencies only occur in the Dominican Republic.
